label: An informal collection of people, without formal governance, such as a distributed hacker group.
A combination of an applicatio, environmentn and a platform, such as a SIEM, Microsoft Exchange etc.
An application or service used to do something, with an SBOM
An operating system, or desired environment for the application to run in
The underlying compute platform being utilised
A formal organization of people, with governance, such as a company or country.
A class of entities, such as all hospitals, all Europeans, or the Domain Administrators in a system.
It is unknown whether the classification is an individual, group, system, organization, or class.
